projects.title: Employd
projects.description: An iOS app to assist with unemployment benefits. Received a Congressional Certificate after Texas Workforce Commissions sponsored the app.
projects.content:
## Overview
Employd is a comprehensive iOS application designed to streamline the unemployment benefits process. The app features an intuitive interface that guides users through the application process, helps track benefit payments, and provides real-time updates on claim status.

### Key Features
- **Smart Form Filling**: AI-powered form completion
- **Real-time Status Updates**: Track your application progress
- **Document Scanner**: Easily upload required documents
- **Multi-language Support**: Available in English and Spanish

### Impact
The app has helped thousands of Texas residents easily apply for and manage their unemployment benefits, significantly reducing the processing time and improving the overall experience.

projects.title: Wing AI
projects.description: A generative AI shopping assistant used in 7 Shopify stores to enhance customer experience.
projects.content:
## Overview
Wing AI is a cutting-edge generative AI shopping assistant designed to revolutionize the e-commerce experience. By leveraging advanced language models, Wing AI helps customers find products more efficiently and provides personalized recommendations.

### Features
- **Natural Language Search**: Find products using conversational queries
- **Personalized Recommendations**: AI-powered product suggestions
- **Smart Filtering**: Advanced filter combinations through natural language

### Technical Implementation
```python
# Example of our recommendation engine
def get_recommendations(user_query, product_catalog):
    # Process user query using NLP
    embedded_query = embed_text(user_query)
    
    # Find similar products
    recommendations = semantic_search(embedded_query, product_catalog)
    return recommendations
```
